Reviews.Title: perfect!  just what i have been wanting!
Reviews.Author: Tung Mau Vu "dark star"
Reviews.Content: all i want is to talk and txt.ideally any Blackberry would work! but AT&T; forced me to get a data plan, which i would never use! so i searched everywhere for a nice qwerty phone. i have tried the cheaper Dr Tech IP88,  and that worked for 4 months till the phone died thanks to poor build quality.and then i found this Motorola EX223. i love it!!!it is so slim. the kb is great for texting. the build quality is very good! i did not even know it has a touchscreen!!!so what is not to love?the battery lasts for at least 1 week! it has fm radio, plays mp3 on microSDHC, the phone is so light i can hold it forever unlike a smartphone like iphone, comfortable keys for txt. and best of all?  no stupid data plans forced onto by AT&T.;dont expect anything from the camera or the mediocre apps....because this isnt exactly a smartphone ok?!

Reviews.Title: My Two Complaints
Reviews.Author: Russ
Reviews.Content: I have had the Motorola EX223 for several months now and I have two major complaints:1.  No way to select vibrator vs sound for alerts or calls.  It appears to have a vibrator because with some menu selections it will acknowledge with a slight shake.2. You can turn the volume down from maximum of 7 to 0 and you will not get a ring when a call is received; however you will still get an alert sound every time there is a text message and I have not found anyway to turn that off.UPDATE: I just learned how to set the device to vibrate and not ring.  There is a pull down menu accessed by a tiny series of bars, that brings up some options for profile etc. In one of these the alerts can be changed.  I found this out from a UTube video on the EX223, not from any manual or forum.

Reviews.Title: My my, very nice
Reviews.Author: DrSparx "The Master of Sparx"
Reviews.Content: This is an unlocked dual SIM GSM phone. Does not have wifi. One SIM has 3G capability. Battery lasts for days. The radio is very nice, allows you access to alternate music venues. Very light. Touch screen and full keyboard.

Reviews.Title: Not a Winner
Reviews.Author: dl
Reviews.Content: One of the problems with this phone is the users manual and all included printed material is in Chinese.  I contacted Motorola directly and this phone was not manufactured for sale in the United States so they do not have an English version available.They have a quick start guide on their web site, it's not much help.The sound quality is bad.  It does not show you the name or number when sending a text. Keys are hard to see.One aggravation after another with this phone, ( a manual to reference might of been some help ).Returned the Phone.

Reviews.Title: Grreat cheap dual SIM GSM phone
Reviews.Author: KoLo
Reviews.Content: Great dual SIM GSM phone. The instructions are NOT in English but for anyone with a basic knowledge of how a phone works it is very easy to learn. Camera is OK, nothing special but it is a cheap phone. Battery last almost a full 48 hours with average use, My father in-law uses the phone and does not have any email or any data at all to use for the phone, calls and SMS text messages only. You have the option of selecting which SIM you would like to use data from, so you do not have to have a package on both for browsing, but will if you want to receive MMS messages (picture messages).Bottom line, if you want a simple phone with a touch screen and a full keyboard that is Dual SIM it is a great phone, there is a very small learning curve with no English instructions but it is simple enough.

Reviews.Title: Good Price and practical cellphone. Small and light compared to extremely large cellphones that are coming out these days...
Reviews.Author: Patrick A. R.
Reviews.Content: Nice phone does it job! Really like it so far. Would definitely recommend it if you are looking to text and talk mainly. Would not recommend it for constant internet browsing.( Get a smartphone for constant internet browsing )

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Susan Renee
Reviews.Content: great buy no complaints, actually want to buy another phone as soon as possible.  I would recommend with no hesitation

Reviews.Title: Just right for me!
Reviews.Author: Asoka
Reviews.Content: Perfect little phone for people who call and text mostly. Instructions are in Chinese but it seems easy to figure out. It's light and thin. For the price, it's definitely worth it. Can't say much about durability since I got it today but I'm satisfied so far.

Reviews.Title: hi
Reviews.Author: Kathleen
Reviews.Content: this is a very good phone have no problems with it,good features also love the dual sim i have 2 sim cards

Reviews.Title: pretty good little phone but has faults
Reviews.Author: jojo
Reviews.Content: main complaint is there is no english user manual (just chinese). also there is no english manual on the motorola website--which is wierd. no speaker phone option. no alternate ringer tones, the standard ringer tone is annoying. phone settings are limited. another odd thing is if you search by product name on the motorola website--you get No Results. ts too bad because its a nice little phone but very disappointing support from Motorola.

Reviews.Title: Happy campers, a great cell phone----
Reviews.Author: Dave L
Reviews.Content: Well, I was a happy camper when this product played out all the ad copy and documentation available. Yes there is no English manual with this device. You must be cell phone savvy to get the screen menus. I spent some hours with the device and explored the internet for solutions to begin with. Honestly, it did get fun once the maze was decoded. The little phone is comfortable for my wife to use, and being only a text/voice device is basically what she wanted. It has great clarity in voice, and text working the keyboard is a gemstone process. Wife said, "Finally someone made a cell phone for girls to use with nails " --well something like that----I did like the text keys, and my hands are contractor grade, so it makes my day also---

Reviews.Title: Truth
Reviews.Author: ossieb4
Reviews.Content: I bought the EX115 and the EX228  sometime ago and this phone is basically both of them in one unit.

Reviews.Title: okay for an affordable motorola
Reviews.Author: laurie mcdonald
Reviews.Content: very difficult to use but it is a motorola so i will keep it lol  the menu setup is obnoxiously confusing and you cant customize the internet function shortcuts.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Lisa Pratt
Reviews.Content: Good product. It will work for someone who can make use of it with certain phone service providers.  However, it won't accept Verizon.

Reviews.Title: Very good programming, excellent phone build, exactly what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Brandon McDaniel
Reviews.Content: Awesome phone, can't think of anything that's wrong with it, and the OS went above and beyond what I was expecting.  It seems Motorola thought of everything.  It's super fast.  I cried nerd tears when I tried out this phone

Reviews.Title: Great nonsmart fon!
Reviews.Author: getrdone
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter to replace the Pantech she had.  She says it is like night and day better!She is okay that it is not a smart phone.  She likes to talk and text most.  She uses her Kindle for onlinebusiness anyways.  She recommends this for being easy to use.  However, please note if it were me thathad gotten this with only "CHINESE"  MANUAL we might be in trouble.....I am not too tech savvy.....she saidit was not hard to figure out and loves the touch screen option.

Reviews.Title: Very bad sound
Reviews.Author: Danny D "The Buyer"
Reviews.Content: The sound is quite awful. Distortion and lack of clarity. I am not happy about that and neither is my wife who the phone was for.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone for  global traveler
Reviews.Author: Nelson Garcia
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone specifically because I was going to china for 12 days.  Well I am still in china and this phone along with a sim card from onesimcard.com along with my tmobile sim card have performed great.  I can receive a call or text from the tmobile sim card and respond with the global sim card to reduce costs.  The phone is easy to use and  most questions you may hare are answered in the amazon posting for this phone.  This phone is straightforward and doesn't come with all the bells and whistles of a smart phone, but it does serve the purpose of maintaining basic communication needs when somewhere in the world.  I would buy the phone again.  I actually like it better than my previous nokia phone.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised, duel sin, unlocked.
Reviews.Author: Lee F
Reviews.Content: Duel SIM cards did work in Europe, FM radio  functional, decent sound quality, the home screen is pretty intuitive, also has good battery life. Biggest negative is the owners manual is in Chinese. We had to search the internet for an English/ India version. We also found a You tube video that was helpful. Camera is just ok. Overall a good value, if it had wifi connectability, it would be 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Regielito D. Pagmanua
Reviews.Content: good phone for traveling, i like the dual sim feature where you can put another sim card. good price for unlock phone

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived on time, new as advertised and functions same. I like it already but wish it had gps so I can roam a lot more with careless abandon!

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: Vince
Reviews.Content: it meets all expectations. The phone performed everyhing I expected it to do. The only problem it came without and English handbook. It came with a Chinese handbook.

Reviews.Title: works fine but...
Reviews.Author: herbie
Reviews.Content: Really difficult to figure out how to program data config for AT&T; - nothing seemed to work, and finally, it seems that AT&T; pushed the settings into the phone automatically. Daughter loves the phone and keyboard texting functionality, especially since she doesn't get a smartphone and data plan.

Reviews.Title: Full MArks
Reviews.Author: Anthony l Carter
Reviews.Content: The person this item was bought for absolutely loves it and their sister likes it as well and they have been playing quite joyfully with it since they received it. so they would both recommend this phone to anyone. and the price is pretty great as well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Little Phone
Reviews.Author: raul l. calzadilla
Reviews.Content: Well I haven't put a SIM card into it yet because it will be used in a foreign country very shortly.The battery had a charge on it  and began trying all the icons and settings etc. You relly don't need instructions with this phone. Just play with it and you quickly learn what each one is for.I don't own a smart phone but I use my wife's ocassionally, so I'm no expert and find it easy to use.Everything is crisp and neat to operate, buttons are just perfect the touch/swipe works perfet as well. Navigation is totally intuitive for a 70 year old like me.For the price and quality you can't beat this phone. Very light and easy to carry, conceal in your pocket and if it gets lost or stolen it's not much of a loss. It's not flashy so doesn't attrack the attention of thiefs.This is not a Smart phone but I didn't want one either. It's operating system is Motorola not Android, which makes no difference to me.It's has all the features and functions of a modern cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for!
Reviews.Author: Donna Messersmith
Reviews.Content: This phone is very user friendly.  Motorola phones are my favorite and this one certainly hasn't let me down.  I needed something simple and easy to use and this is just what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: its perfect!
Reviews.Author: Angela Bonilla
Reviews.Content: I like it covers my expectations and is quite functional! is recommended for users who are not willing to use tactile phones

Reviews.Title: Very, very good phone!!
Reviews.Author: Nelangel
Reviews.Content: I begin this comment saying that this is not a Smartphone, you can not install applications on it like WhatsApp, Skype, Opera, Firefox, etc., The camera -for my tastes- it's good (from 10 points, I give it  5.5), and I think okay so this phone offers, and given the excellent battery life, dual SIM, QWERTY keyboard is comfortable and incidentally touch screen, it's definitely a phone input to consider very seriously ... And coming from the undisputed quality of Motorola, is another plus to get one of these .... My mother is over three months with it and has been a pleasure! ....... I recommend it 100%! ...************Para empezar, esto no es un Smartphone, no puedes instalarle aplicaciones como Whatsapp, Skype, Opera, Firefox, etc., la cámara -para mis gustos- la catalogo como buena (de 10 puntos, le doy un 5.5),  y en conjunto, creo que está bien por lo que ofrece este teléfono, además teniendo en cuenta la excelente duración de la batería, doble SIM, el teclado QWERTY es cómodo y de paso pantalla Táctil, definitivamente es un teléfono de entrada a tomar en consideración muy seriamente...  Y viniendo de la calidad indiscutible de  MOTOROLA,  es otro punto a favor para hacerse con uno de estos.... Mi madre tiene más de 3 meses con el y ha sido todo un placer!!....... Lo recomiendo 100%!!...

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: wily guerrero
Reviews.Content: very good,  only need  android,  by is good cell phonespleaces  if this cell  have any model whiht android, let me see.

Reviews.Title: holidays
Reviews.Author: RICARDO MAYORGA
Reviews.Content: I didn't know how to stuff a stocking so I saw this phone for a 10 year old hope he likes it.

Reviews.Title: An excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Camilo Marcelo Zeledón Lorío
Reviews.Content: An excellent purchase. This cellular loves my dad. It is really easy to use and has the basic features. Furthermore, the design is nice and is comfortable to carry.

Reviews.Title: Trash!!
Reviews.Author: Donna Tytran
Reviews.Content: The directions were in Chinese!!! I went to  MOTO site to get the directions in English the keyboard was so small I couldn't  read it even with my glasses I got so mad I actually threw it in the trash!!

Reviews.Title: telefono dañado
Reviews.Author: Luna E. MacHado
Reviews.Content: Buenas el producto llego dañado, la pantalla tiene una rotura interna que le salen rayas que se estan regando, aparte no llegaron los accesorios completos y el adaptor del cargador no es el correcto, ya habia introduccido un comentario sobre el producto, el cual fue un engaño, me enviaron un producto dañado, el celular parece usado y en malas condiciones.
